actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to deductions for the payment of certain expenses by members of the uniformed services who receive housing allowances.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow members of the uniformed services to deduct expenses related to tax-exempt housing allowances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to deductions for the payment of certain expenses by members of the uniformed services who receive housing allowances.
